alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington, north central Hyde, west central Dare and Tyrrell Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alligator Lake, or 27 miles southeast of Plymouth, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Killkenny, Alligator, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Columbia, East Lake, Woodley, Newfoundland, Buffalo City, Phelps Lake, Frying Pan Landing, Pungo Lake, Alligator Lake and Creswell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington
